Write a script like this:

```sh
cut -d , -f 1 $@ | grep -v Date | sort | uniq | sort -n
```

`@instructions`

- Write a script to do ...
- Save it as `./count-dates.sh`
- Change permissions using `chmod u+x ./count-dates`
- Run it with `./count-dates data/*.csv`.

`@solution`

`@@Terminal`


`@@count-dates.sh`

```{text}

```
